workflow-instructions.name: team-formation
workflow-instructions.overview: Set up the venture team operational foundation in Week 1. Creates the Team Charter covering: team composition, roles, weekly cadence, tools, ways of working, budget, and team identity.

step.name: venture-challenge
step.title: Frame the Venture Challenge
step.instructions: Work with the user to frame the venture challenge statement: 1. Load venture-canvas.md if it exists — use as starting point 2. Facilitate: "How might we [solve problem] for [customer] so that [outcome]?" 3. Articulate WHY this venture exists — the reason for incubating this specific idea now 4. Confirm: entry point (domain exploration or specific idea?) 5. Set the timeline: incubation start date, Week 8 check-in gate, Week 12 final gate

step.name: team-composition
step.title: Define Team Composition and Roles
step.instructions: Map the team: 1. Who is on the venture team? Names, roles, backgrounds, % allocation 2. Identify gaps: What skills are missing? How will gaps be filled (hire, contract, mothership resource)? 3. Confirm the Sponsor (mothership corporate champion) 4. Identify the NVB / reporting structure 5. Clarify: who makes day-to-day decisions vs. who needs to be consulted?

step.name: cadence-tools
step.title: Establish Cadence and Tools
step.instructions: Set up how the team operates: 1. Define weekly meeting cadence (stand-up, deep work session, review) 2. Select tools: project management, comms, docs, research, prototype/build, analytics 3. Define how decisions get made and escalated 4. Establish how the team will communicate with the Sponsor and NVB 5. Set up the output folder structure for venture artifacts

step.name: team-identity
step.title: Create Team Identity
step.instructions: Build the team's identity and culture: 1. Name/codename for the venture team 2. 3-5 team values (what we stand for, how we work) 3. Working norms: what we commit to, what we will always do, what we will never do 4. How will the team celebrate wins and process learnings? 5. Energy: what's exciting about this venture for each team member?

step.name: budget-constraints
step.title: Confirm Budget and Constraints
step.instructions: Confirm the operational boundaries: 1. Incubation budget total and breakdown (research, experiments, travel, tech) 2. Legal and IP support — who, contact, availability 3. Technology/infrastructure support from mothership 4. Key constraints: regulatory, IP, market segments off-limits 5. Hard timeline deadlines — what cannot move?

step.name: team-charter-output
step.title: Produce Team Charter
step.instructions: Compile all inputs into the Team Charter using the team-charter.md template. Fill all sections. Review with user. Save to output folder. Update venture-state.yaml: mark team-charter as complete in category_progress.team.
